types:type.name: payment_response
types:type.types:shape: %dw 2.0 type payment_response = {| PaymentId: String, Amount: {| Amount: Number {"typeId": "double"}, Currency: String |}, TransasctionCost: Number {"typeId": "double"}, TransferProtocol: String, PaymentPath: String, PaymentStatus: String, Debtor: {| Account: {| AccountId: String, AccountType: String, BankId: String, BankName: String |} |}, Creditor: {| Account: {| AccountId: String, AccountType: String, BankId: String, BankName: String |} |} |} {"MetadataFormat": "json", "example": "{\"PaymentId\":\"end-to-end-number\",\"Amount\":{\"Amount\":333.33,\"Currency\":\"USD\"},\"TransasctionCost\":10.00,\"TransferProtocol\":\"SWIFT\",\"PaymentPath\":\"XFER_INTER_BANK_INT\",\"PaymentStatus\":\"PROCESSED\",\"Debtor\":{\"Account\":{\"AccountId\":\"123456\",\"AccountType\":\"CHECKING\",\"BankId\":\"IBAN_NUM\",\"BankName\":\"BOA\"}},\"Creditor\":{\"Account\":{\"AccountId\":\"123456\",\"AccountType\":\"CHECKING\",\"BankId\":\"IBAN_NUM\",\"BankName\":\"BOA\"}}}"}
